DOC.brief_summary: To determine the efficacy of subcutaneous MNTX to relieve opioid-induced constipation in patients with advanced medical illness.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Methylnaltrexone (MNTX) for the Relief of Constipation
DOC.detailed_description: This is a multi-center, double-blind, randomized parallel group study conducted in patients with advanced medical illness and opioid-induced constipation. Eligible patients are randomly assigned to receive SC doses of either MNTX, dose 1 or placebo every other day for 2 weeks. At Day 8, eligible patients, if allowed, could be escalated to a a higher dose of MNTX.
